products.name: Banana
products.description: Delicious and ripe bananas with a natural sweetness. A great source of potassium and energy. Enjoy as a quick snack or add to your favorite recipes.

products.name: Brocolli
products.description: Fresh and crisp broccoli florets, packed with essential nutrients and antioxidants. Ideal for steaming, stir-frying, or adding to your favorite pasta dishes.

products.name: Spinach
products.description: Fresh and nutritious spinach leaves harvested from organic farms. Packed with vitamins and minerals, perfect for salads, smoothies, or as a healthy side dish.

products.name: Avocado
products.description: Creamy and nutritious avocados, rich in healthy fats and fiber. Perfect for making guacamole, adding to sandwiches, or enjoying as a satisfying snack.

categories.name: Fruits
categories.description: Explore a wide variety of fresh and juicy fruits.
